ext_common.h

00001 /* common.h -- those things we define often */
00002 #ifndef _EXT_COMMON_H_
00003 #define _EXT_COMMON_H_
00004 
00005 
00006 /**
00007     If a value is within the specified range, then return true.  Otherwise return false.
00008 
00009     @ingroup    misc
00010     @param  v   The value to test.
00011     @param  lo  The low bound for the range.
00012     @param  hi  The high bound for the range.
00013     @return     Returns true if within range, otherwise false.
00014 */
00015 #define InRange(v,lo,hi) ((v)<=(hi)&&(v)>=(lo))
00016 
00017 
00018 /**
00019     Return the higher of two values.
00020 
00021     @ingroup    misc
00022     @param  a   The first value to compare.
00023     @param  b   The second value to compare.
00024     @return     Returns the higher of a or b.
00025 */
00026 #define MAX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
00027 
00028 
00029 /**
00030     Return the lower of two values.
00031 
00032     @ingroup    misc
00033     @param  a   The first value to compare.
00034     @param  b   The second value to compare.
00035     @return     Returns the lower of a or b.
00036 */
00037 #define MIN(a,b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
00038 
00039 
00040 /**
00041     Limit values to within a specified range.
00042 
00043     @ingroup    misc
00044     @param  a   The value to constrain.
00045     @param  lo  The low bound for the range.
00046     @param  hi  The high bound for the range.
00047     @return     Returns the value a constrained to the range specified by lo and hi.
00048 */
00049 #define CLIP(a, lo, hi) ( (a)>(lo)?( (a)<(hi)?(a):(hi) ):(lo) )
00050 
00051 
00052 #define OSTAsChars(x) (int)((x)>>24)&0xFF,(int)((x)>>16)&0xFF,(int)((x)>>8)&0xFF,(int)((x)&0xFF)
00053 
00054 
00055 #endif /* _EXT_COMMON_H_ */
